titles.title: America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership Reauthorization Act
To reauthorize the America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership.
America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership Reauthorization Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

bill.summary: America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership Reauthorization Act - Amends the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 reauthorize the America's Agricultural Heritage Partnership (located in Iowa).
